original_text: For even when we were with you, we would give you this command: If anyone is not willing to work, let him not eat.
korean_text: 우리가 너희와 함께 있을 때에도 너희에게 명하기를 누구든지 일하기 싫어하거든 먹지도 말게 하라 하였더니

sentences.original_text: For even when we were with you,
we would give you this command:
If anyone is not willing to work,
